metadata.title: CVE-2019-14745 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In radare2 before 3.7.0, a command injection vulnerability exists inbin_symbols() in libr/core/cbin.c. By using a crafted executable file, it'spossible to execute arbitrary shell commands with the permissions of thevictim. This vulnerability is due to improper handling of symbol namesembedded in executables.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
